description:
A kappa learns to fish.  Buddha eats some snacks... or does he? A sparrow and woodpecker visit their dying mother.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kappa Kozou / Oshou to Kozou no Kuwan, Kutta / Suzume to Kitsutsuki
The Kappa Kid / The Priest and the Kid`s `Who Ate It?` / The Sparrow and the Woodpecker
カッパ小僧 / 和尚と小僧のくわん, くった / 雀とキツツキ
